attributes.action: Review and change ALL legislation regarding convicted criminals rights to sue for compensation for injuries received from either the Police or any law abiding citizens defending their property and persons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Revoke ANY rights to the criminal (If convicted beyond doubt) for the ability to appeal or sue ANY agency of the country or person for injuries received whilst participating in ANY act of criminal behaviour!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
